actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Mineral Lands Leasing Act.

summary.text: Amends the Mineral Lands Leasing Act to direct the Secretary of the Interior to lease Federal lands not within any known geological structure of a producing oil or gas field, unless the Secretary determines that it is not in the national interest to lease any such lands and the Congress approves the Secretary's determination.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Mineral Lands Leasing Act.
